page.title: 12HOUSING IN BARLBY
page.content: We have a few estates round Barlby: Barratt's (which is our newest),the Third Estate and Northfield. There are many streets with terraced houses near the Toll Bridge. In the new estate there are mostly semi_detached and detached houses with gardens. A lot of new houses have been built in the last few years because people have moved in to work at the new coalmine . A Mine Rescue Station was built throughout this year and all the people that work there live in a new estate together. Nobody is allowed in unless they work there. There are also some old buildings in the village e.g. Old School, Barlby House and Barlby Hall. Leaving Barlby on the Hull Road you come to Osgodby where the houses are mostly semi_detached and bungalows.
